title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
March 8, 2019
On Friday, March 8, 2019, the President signed into law:S. 483, the “Pesticide Registration Improvement Extension
Act of 2018,” which reauthorizes and updates the fee collection provisions and authorities available under the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act and addresses worker protection matters.
